scripts.install: npm run install-api && npm run install-web
scripts.build: npm run build-api && npm run build-web
scripts.build-api: cd library-api && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build-web: cd library-web-app && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.start: npm run start-api && npm run start-web
scripts.start-api: cd library-api && npm run start & cd ..
scripts.start-web: cd library-web-app && npm run start & cd ..
